hello everyone: have a quick question, new to the ubuntu scene, using 10.04. just installed xchat using "sudo apt-get install xchat". how do I get xchat to connect to the following server: irc://irc.irchighway.net/lurk     ?
Well, lucid support in #ubuntu+1, but basically, add a server "irc.irchighway.net" to the list and join channel #lurk
As server, you just type "irc.irchighway.net", not the whole link
